add-existing-player.title: Add-Existing-Player
add-existing-player.content:
This command is used to add a player who already exists in the bot's records (see check-player) to a team.

This command can only be used by a team leader.

change-team-clantag.title: Change-Team-Clantag
change-team-clantag.content:
This command is used to change a team's clantag. It cannot be changed to NULL.

This command can only be used by a team leader.

change-teammate-clantag.title: Change-Teammate-Clantag
change-teammate-clantag.content:
This command is used to change a teammate's clantag. It can be used to remove from the roster (can be NULL) or change it to another team.

This command can only be used by a team leader.

delete-team-registry.title: Delete-Team-Registry
delete-team-registry.content:
This command is used to delete a team's registry, along with its players, from the bot's database.

This command can only be used by the team leader who registered the team.

delete-teammate-registry.title: Delete-Teammate-Registry
delete-teammate-registry.content:
This command is used to delete a player's registry from the bot's database.

This command can only be used by the team leader who registered the team.

personal-stats-tier10.title: Personal-Stats-Tier-10
personal-stats-tier10.content:
This command is used to query the win rate in tier 10 of a player.

This command can be used by anyone.

roster.title: Roster
roster.content:
This command is used to display the full structure of a team, including each player's win rate and the team's overall win rate.

This command can be used by anyone.

single-teammate-registration.title: Single-Teammate-Registration
single-teammate-registration.content:
This command is used to register a player in the bot's database.

This command can be used by anyone.

team-registration.title: Team-Registration
team-registration.content:
This command is used to register a team in the bot's database.

This command can only be used by a team leader.

team-stats.title: Team-Stats
team-stats.content:
This command is used to query the statistics of a team, including win and loss rates.

This command can be used by anyone.
